title: Jesus is Arrested, Tried, and Denied
summary: Jesus is brought before Pilate, mocked, and sentenced to death. He is crucified between two criminals and dies after hours of suffering. A Roman centurion declares Him the Son of God. Jesus is buried in a tomb.

faq.question: What is a key message in Mark 15?
faq.answer: It emphasizes the servant nature of Jesus and the power of faith in action.

faq.question: What does Mark 15 reveal about Jesus?
faq.answer: It shows His authority, compassion, and call to follow Him wholeheartedly.
